title: Science Lesson Design Utilizing Media Comparison and the TPACK Framework

context.prior_knowledge: Understanding of fundamental educational technology and experience in teaching science subjects
context.additional_context: Conducted in a smartphone-based microlearning environment, focusing on enhancing in-service science teachers' instructional design competencies

learning_goals: Learners can apply media comparison research methods (parameter-method integration approach) when designing science lessons using five modern technologies
Learners can develop concrete lesson scenarios by integrating TPACK framework's technological, pedagogical, and content knowledge principles into science instruction
Learners can design formative assessment strategies optimized for mobile environments and analyze learner performance results

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
